title: To the Lighthouse -  "She did too" conveys which

content.prompt: The fourth sentence, “She did too” conveys which of the following?

choices.label: Charles Tansley’s perception of Mrs. Ramsay’s character
A reply of Mrs. Ramsay to Charles Tansley
The narrator’s criticism of Charles Tansley’s naïveté

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
